mapper.select: SELECT hotel_no, partner_no, p_file_no, partner_name, partner_longitude, partner_latitude, p_file_name, partner_content, partner_zip_code, partner_basic_addr, partner_detail_addr, partner_tel, partner_type FROM ( SELECT P.hotel_no, P.partner_no, PF.p_file_no, P.partner_name, P.partner_longitude, P.partner_latitude, PF.p_file_name, P.partner_content, P.partner_zip_code, P.partner_basic_addr, P.partner_detail_addr, P.partner_tel,P.partner_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P.partner_no ORDER BY PF.p_file_no ASC) as rn FROM partner P inner join p_file PF on P.partner_no = PF.partner_no ) WHERE rn=1 and hotel_no= #{hotel_no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.hotel_no, P.partner_no, PF.p_file_no, P.partner_name, PF.p_file_name, P.partner_zip_code, P.partner_basic_addr, P.partner_detail_addr, P.partner_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P.partner_no ORDER BY PF.p_file_no ASC) as rn FROM partner P inner join p_file PF on P.partner_no = PF.partner_no ) WHERE hotel_no= #{hotel_no} and partner_type = '승인대기'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.hotel_no, P.partner_no, PF.p_file_no, P.partner_name, PF.p_file_name, P.partner_zip_code, P.partner_basic_addr, P.partner_detail_addr, P.partner_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P.partner_no ORDER BY PF.p_file_no ASC) as rn FROM partner P inner join p_file PF on P.partner_no = PF.partner_no ) WHERE hotel_no= #{hotel_no} and partner_type = '승인완료'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.hotel_no, P.partner_no, PF.p_file_no, P.partner_name, PF.p_file_name, P.partner_zip_code, P.partner_basic_addr, P.partner_detail_addr, P.partner_type, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P.partner_no ORDER BY PF.p_file_no ASC) as rn FROM partner P inner join p_file PF on P.partner_no = PF.partner_no ) WHERE hotel_no= #{hotel_no} and partner_type = '승인거절'

where ${type} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
